i m dissatisfied with the school life i ve had so far.
i am a weightlifter.

participant_2.background:
I loved spending hours in the woods behind my house, making up stories and worlds.
I'm afraid my car will break down while I'm out fishing.
I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.
I like to cuddle up with my dog Wonwon on a rainy day.
I collect yarn from different places to use in my crochet projects.

content.text: Not much, just relaxing on my day off. How about you?
I'm good, just got back from the gym. I'm a weightlifter and I really enjoy it.
That's awesome! I love working out too, but I'm more into cardio and yoga.
I like that too, but I need to focus on building up my strength. I'm the general manager of the local grocery store and I need to be able to lift heavy boxes.
That makes sense. I used to work at a grocery store when I was in college. It was a lot of fun, but it was also really hard work.
It is, but I love it. I get to meet a lot of interesting people and I get to help out my community.
That's awesome! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! What do you do for a living?
I'm a stay-at-home mom right now, but I used to be a teacher.
That's really cool! I've always thought about being a teacher, but I'm not sure if I'm cut out for it.
It's definitely a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding. I loved getting to teach kids and help them learn.
I think that's amazing. I'm sure you were a great teacher.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so
